sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pakar_ciri ( "_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, "ciri" VARCHAR NOT NULL, "creation_date" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

CREATE TABLE pakar_rusak ( "_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, "rusak" VARCHAR NOT NULL, "gejala" text NOT NULL, "pencegahan" text NOT NULL, "solusi" text NOT NULL, "creation_date" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

CREATE TABLE pakar_ciri_data ( "_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, "rusak_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "ciri_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "creation_date" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
